name: Brandon Cheng
description: In honor of my grandmother, Wen Li. Born into poverty during the Chinese Civil War, she overcame all the odds stacked against her to become a female doctor in China in the 1950s. She's shown me what it means to lead one's life in service to others--to always give to others even when one does not have much.
